name: Balance Off
description:
Welcome to the game page of Balance Off !
This game has been done in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace Jam #8 !

Fruits and other...random stuff are falling from the sky. Try to put them on the center of your scale plates ! But be careful: stay balanced !


Credits:
GameDev , GameDesign and some Arts: Yohann Degli Esposti

Arts:
Food Icons Pack - Angelina Avgustova
2D Adventure Beach - Super Brutal Asset

Music:
Grocery Store - HeatleyBros
TRAINING MODE! - HeatleyBros
